author: Daniel Greene
description:
Discover the dark, tragic world of Elric of Melniboné, the albino sorcerer-emperor who changed fantasy forever. In this deep dive, we explore the Elric Saga by Michael Moorcock — from his origins in the 1960s pulp magazines to his role in shaping modern fantasy, from cursed swords and cosmic gods to multiversal battles and moral ambiguity.

Learn how Elric influenced The Witcher, Game of Thrones, Dungeons & Dragons, and more. Whether you're new to the saga or revisiting a classic, let's break down the plot, characters, themes, and legacy of one of fantasy’s most iconic antiheroes.

title: The Elric Saga Explained | Michael Moorcock’s Flawed Masterpiece
